member.name: T:LightCore.CommonServiceLocator.LightCoreAdapter
member.summary: Represents an adapter for the interface, for the "CommonServiceLocator" project.

member.name: M:LightCore.CommonServiceLocator.LightCoreAdapter.DoGetInstance(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Get an instance by service type and name (key).
member.param: The key, (Supply null, named dependecies are not allowed).

member.name: M:LightCore.CommonServiceLocator.LightCoreAdapter.DoGetAllInstances(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets all instances by service type.
